DIV1.HEAD: SOME QUERIES Sent up to his Excellency the Earl of Bellomont, by the House of Representatives of the Province of New-York the 31th July, 1770. concerning his Excellency's Proposition to them of building a Fort for defence of the five Nations of Indians.
